summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 FOUR WINDS HURRICANE RECREATIONAL VEHICLE.  THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE WINDSHIELD POPPED OUT OF THE FRAME AND FELL TO THE GROUND.  THE MANUFACTURER WOULD NOT ASSIST WITH THE REPAIRS.  THE WINDSHIELD WAS REPAIRED AT THE CONTACT'S EXPENSE BY AN INDEPENDENT DEALER.  THE DEALER STATED THAT THE WINDOW WAS NOT INSTALLED PROPERLY AT THE FACTORY AND SHOULD BE REPAIRED AT THE MANUFACTURER'S EXPENSE.  THE FAILURE AND CURRENT MILEAGES WERE LESS THAN 27,500. UPDATED 7/1/09 *CN  UPDATED 07/07/09.*JB
